doc.description:
Class text
string manipulation class

This class only uses static methods and has lots of alias for the escaping methods

name: bbn\Str

cast.name: cast
cast.summary: Converts any type of variable to a string.

changeCase.name: changeCase
changeCase.summary: Converts the case of a string.

arguments.name: case
arguments.description: The case to convert to ("lower" or "upper"), default being the title case.

escapeAllQuotes.name: escapeAllQuotes
escapeAllQuotes.summary: Escapes all quotes (single and double) from a given string.

description_parts.content:
X::dump(\bbn\Str::escapeDquotes('the "Gay Pride" is is Putin\'s favorite'));
// (string) "the \"Gay Pride\" is is Putin\'s favorite"

escapeDquotes.name: escapeDquotes
escapeDquotes.summary: Escapes the string in double quotes.

description_parts.content:
X::dump(\bbn\Str::escapeDquotes('this is the house "Mary"'));
// (string) "this is the house \"Mary\""

escapeDquote.name: escapeDquote

description_parts.content:
X::dump(\bbn\Str::escapeDquote('this is the house "Mary"'));
// (string) "this is the house \"Mary\""

escapeQuote.name: escapeQuote

description_parts.content:
X::dump(\bbn\Str::escapeQuote('this is the house "Mary"'));
// (string) "this is the house \"Mary\""

escapeQuotes.name: escapeQuotes

description_parts.content:
X::dump(\bbn\Str::escapeQuotes('this is the house "Mary"'));
// (string) "this is the house \"Mary\""

cleanSpaces.name: cleanSpaces
cleanSpaces.summary: Trims, and removes extra spaces (all more than one)

cut.name: cut
cut.summary: Cuts a string (HTML and PHP tags stripped) to maximum length inserted.

sanitize.name: sanitize
sanitize.summary: Strip special characters except the below:
sanitize.description:
- ~ , ; [ ] ( ) .
And removes more that two trailing periods

description_parts.content: • ~ , ; [ ] ( ) . And removes more that two trailing periods

encodeFilename.name: encodeFilename
encodeFilename.summary: Returns a cross-platform filename for the file.

arguments.name: maxlength
arguments.description: The maximum filename length (without extension), default: "50".

arguments.name: is_path
arguments.description: path   Tells if the slashes (/) are authorized in the string

encodeDbname.name: encodeDbname
encodeDbname.summary: Returns a corrected string for database naming.

fileExt.name: fileExt

arguments.name: ar
arguments.description: If "true" also returns the file path, default: "false".

genpwd.name: genpwd

isHTML.name: isHTML

isJson.name: isJson
isJson.summary: Checks if the string is a json string.

isNumber.name: isNumber
isNumber.summary: Checks if the item is a number.

description_parts.content: Can take as many arguments and will return false if one of them is not a number.

getNameFromIndex.name: getNameFromIndex

isInteger.name: isInteger
isInteger.summary: Checks if the item is a integer.

description_parts.content: Can take as many arguments and will return false if one of them is not an integer or the string of an integer.

isCleanPath.name: isCleanPath
isCleanPath.summary: Checks if ".. \\" or "../" is contained in the parameter and it will return false if true.

isDecimal.name: isDecimal
isDecimal.summary: Checks if the item is a decimal.

description_parts.content: Can take many arguments and it will return false if one of them is not a decimal or the string of a decimal (float).

isUid.name: isUid
isUid.summary: Checks if the string is a valid UID string.

isBuid.name: isBuid
isBuid.summary: Checks if the string is a valid binary UID string.

isEmail.name: isEmail
isEmail.summary: Checks if the string is the correct type of e-mail address.

isUrl.name: isUrl
isUrl.summary: Checks if the argument is a valid URL string.

isDomain.name: isDomain
isDomain.summary: Checks if the argument is a valid domain name.

isIp.name: isIp
isIp.summary: Checks if the argument is a valid ip address.

isDateSql.name: isDateSql
isDateSql.summary: Checks if the argument is in a valid SQL date format.

correctTypes.name: correctTypes
correctTypes.summary: If it looks like an int or float type, the string variable is converted into the correct type.

parseUrl.name: parseUrl
parseUrl.summary: Returns an array containing any of the various components of the URL that are present.

parsePath.name: parsePath
parsePath.summary: Replaces backslash with slash in a path string. Forbids the use of ../

arguments.name: allow_parent
arguments.description: parent If true ../ is allowed in the path (and will become normalized).

removeAccents.name: removeAccents
removeAccents.summary: Replaces accented characters with their character without the accent.

description_parts.content:
X::dump(\bbn\Str::removeAccents("TÃ¨st FÃ¬lÃ¨ Ã²Ã¨Ã Ã¹è"));
// (string) TA¨st FA¬lA¨ A²A¨A A¹e"

checkName.name: checkName
checkName.summary: Checks if a string complies with SQL naming convention.

checkFilename.name: checkFilename
checkFilename.summary: Checks if a string doesn't contain a filesystem path.

checkPath.name: checkPath
checkPath.summary: Checks if every bit of a string doesn't contain a filesystem path.

hasSlash.name: hasSlash
hasSlash.summary: Returns "true" if slash or backslash are present.

getNumbers.name: getNumbers
getNumbers.summary: Extracts all digits from a string.

makeReadable.name: makeReadable
makeReadable.summary: Returns the argumented value, replacing not standard objects (not stdClass) by their class name.

export.name: export
export.summary: Returns a variable in a mode that is directly usable by PHP.

replaceOnce.name: replaceOnce
replaceOnce.summary: Replaces part of a string. If the part is not found, the method returns the string without change.

removeComments.name: removeComments

saySize.name: saySize
saySize.summary: Converts the bytes to another unit form.

convertSize.name: convertSize
convertSize.summary: Converts size from one unit to another.

checkJson.name: checkJson
checkJson.summary: Checks whether a JSON string is valid or not. If $return_error is set to true, the error will be returned.

markdown2html.name: markdown2html
markdown2html.summary: Transforms a markdown string into HTML.

arguments.name: single_line
arguments.description: line If true the result will not contain paragraph or block element

toCamel.name: toCamel
toCamel.summary: Converts the given string to camel case.

html2text.name: html2text
html2text.summary: Converts HTML to text replacing paragraphs and brs with new lines.

text2html.name: text2html
text2html.summary: Converts text to HTML replacing new lines with brs.

sanitizeHtml.name: sanitizeHtml
sanitizeHtml.summary: Remove malicious code and makes HTML standard compliant.

description:
string manipulation class

This class only uses static methods and has lots of alias for the escaping methods

description_parts.content:
string manipulation class

This class only uses static methods and has lots of alias for the escaping methods
